imdb.plot outline: Australians get a bad rap overseas, and our stocks are especially low in India. In fact a sizeable chunk of India's 1.2 billion people think Aussies are Dumb, Drunk & Racist. But doesn't every country have its negative stereotypes? In this six part factual series, journalist Joe Hildebrand takes four Indians on a road-trip around Australia to examine our worst stereotypes - are we really beer swilling racist bogans, or are we simply misunderstood? Shot entirely on location in India and Australia, this series puts its Indian protagonists smack bang in the middle of passionate debates and immersive experiences that will change their opinion of Australia forever.
imdb.title: Dumb, Drunk & Racist
plot: Australians get a bad rap overseas, and our stocks are especially low in India. In fact a sizeable chunk of India's 1.2 billion people think Aussies are _Dumb, Drunk & Racist_ (qv). But doesn't every country have its negative stereotypes? In this six part factual series, journalist Joe Hildebrand takes four Indians on a road-trip around Australia to examine our worst stereotypes - are we really beer swilling racist bogans, or are we simply misunderstood? Shot entirely on location in India and Australia, this series puts its Indian protagonists smack bang in the middle of passionate debates and immersive experiences that will change their opinion of Australia forever.

Australians get a bad rap overseas, and our stocks are especially low in India. In fact a sizeable chunk of India's 1.2 billion people think Aussies are dumb, drunk and racist. But doesn't every country have its negative stereotypes? In this six part factual series, journalist Joe Hildebrand takes four Indians on a road-trip around Australia to examine our worst stereotypes - are we really beer swilling racist bogans, or are we simply misunderstood? Shot entirely on location in India and Australia, this series puts its Indian protagonists smack bang in the middle of passionate debates and immersive experiences that will change their opinion of Australia forever.
